basics.name: Joseph J. Gardner
basics.label: Principal Scientist, Bioinformatics Platform Manager
basics.summary:
Strategic bioinformatics leader with 8+ years of experience translating multi-omic and real world data into actionable insights across wide scientific applications using end-to-end software development and AI. Combines PhD-level technical expertise with business acumen to support portfolio growth, BD diligence, and commercial strategy.
Outside of work, I'm passionate about operationalizing food justice at a local level for dignified and sustainable public access to fresh, nutritious produce.

work.name: Metabolon
work.position: Principal Scientist and Bioinformatics Platform Manager
work.summary: I lead a small team to cross-functionally translate commercial and scientific needs into stable, interpretable, and secure software applications for the largest, highest-quality provider of metabolomics data in the world. I perform functions spanning design, product, marketing, sales, and competitive intelligence in addition to direct technical implementation. Major initiatives include leading a microbiome launch, supporting tabular multiomics integration, pathways visualizations, spectral delivery support, and cheminformatics workflows.
highlights: 90% reduction in client-facing errors in the first month after being given ownership of the platform
Ideation, development, and deployment of pathway visualization, enrichment, and microbiome analysis tools
Led evaluation of the chemical library against public libraries to justify strategic decision for spectral release
Observed and quantified consultant operations to prioritize workflow and software improvements
Proposed and executed cheminformatics workflows leading to closure of high-value deals
Responsible for generating sales collateral and disseminating competitive and product knowledge internally as the representative of the competitive technical intelligence team
Directly responsible for over $4M in revenue in the quarter since deployment of projects I've led and delivered
Track record of talent development with all reports executing their projects and being promoted to higher roles
